profile.name: Eduardo
profile.title: Computer scientist and engineer
profile.description:
# About Me
I'm a third-year Computer Science student with a strong passion for developing innovative solutions to complex problems. Throughout my studies, I've been exposed to a wide range of technologies, including databases, artificial intelligence, cyber security, and web development, which has allowed me to create interdisciplinary technological projects.

#Key Skills
My key skills include a deep understanding of programming languages such as Python and C++, as well as a basic understanding in web development technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also have experience working with databases and using artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques to analyze and make predictions on large datasets.

studies.name: Degree in Computer Science and Engineering

institution.name: UC3M
institution.description:
I am a third-year Computer Science student with a passion for developing innovative solutions to complex problems, utilizing computer hardware and software to their fullest potential. My studies have given me exposure to a wide range of technologies, such as databases, artificial intelligence, cyber security, and web development, which allows me to construct interdisciplinary technological projects.

I am highly motivated and dedicated to learning and building upon my skills. In my free time, I like to stay up to date with the latest technology trends and explore new programming languages to ensure I have the necessary skills to evolve in this technological era. 

I consider myself an innovative thinker when it comes to creating technological solutions, due to my capacity for thinking outside the box. My innate curiosity about technology pushes me to explore and discover new ways to use technology in creative ways. I am confident in my skill to generate creative ideas and shape them into successful projects.
